title: De Beers ' revenue 2011 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 4028.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 3320.0 was reached at Year 2011
